attributes.action: Either reduce or remove the fuel tax for vehicles of the emergency services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment with the increases in fuel costs, ambulance services and the other emergency services are having to use their budgets to pay for the increase in fuel and possibly reducing services elsewhere.  By reducing the tax on fuel for them, other services would not need to be comprimised.
